gemini_config.system_instruction: I want my Gemini to make make smarter, it should use bold text for headings and emojis. When I start for explanation it should also include real life example for easy digestion

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""I want my Gemini to make make smarter, it should use bold text for headings and emojis. When I start..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
